transformations.name: AlterRow
transformations.description: Upsert if pk key not null

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		reg_code as string,
		reg_description as string,
		ar1_code as string,
		ar1_description as string,
		ar2_code as string,
		ar2_description as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		con_2ltr_code as string,
		con_country_name as string,
		con_oecd as string,
		con_currency_code as string,
		con_eu as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_country.parquet']) ~> preDimCountry
preDimCountry derive(top_code = 'All',
		top_description = 'All Countries',
		con_iso_code = '') ~> DerivedTopLevel
DerivedTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(pk_key))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_country.parquet'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCountry
